title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 16, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 16, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome for Beginners
items.content_text:
### JavaScript * [HueHive (⭐63)](https://github.com/croma-app/croma) *(label: good first issue)*
An open source react native app iOS and android for color palette management
items.content_html:
JavaScript

  • HueHive (⭐63) (label: good first issue)
    An open source react native app iOS and android for color palette management

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Authentication / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [hexaeight-sessions](https://www.npmjs.com/package/hexaeight-sessions) - A powerful NPM library designed to simplify session management and authentication in web applications. Whether you're working with React, Angular, or Vue, [HexaEight Sessions](https://docs.hexaeight.com/HexaEight-Sessions/003-HexaEightSessions/) provides an intuitive interface for managing user sessions efficiently.

### Feature Flags / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [featurit-sdk-angular (⭐3)](https://github.com/featurit/featurit-sdk-angular) - Angular wrapper of the Javascript client for the [FeaturIT](https://featurit.com/) Feature Flag management platform.

### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-emoji-mart-next (⭐1)](https://github.com/arturovt/ngx-emoji-mart-next) - Customizable Slack-like emoji picker.

### Validation / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-control-message (⭐3)](https://github.com/chawkitariq/ngx-control-message) - A library for binding a message to a synchronous or asynchronous form control validator.

### Viewers / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-json-treeview (⭐6)](https://github.com/MichaelDoyle/ngx-json-treeview) - A collapsible JSON tree view for Angular.
items.content_html:
Authentication / Google Developer Experts

  • hexaeight-sessions - A powerful NPM library designed to simplify session management and authentication in web applications. Whether you're working with React, Angular, or Vue, HexaEight Sessions provides an intuitive interface for managing user sessions efficiently.

Feature Flags / Google Developer Experts

  • featurit-sdk-angular (⭐3) - Angular wrapper of the Javascript client for the FeaturIT Feature Flag management platform.

Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-emoji-mart-next (⭐1) - Customizable Slack-like emoji picker.

Validation / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-control-message (⭐3) - A library for binding a message to a synchronous or asynchronous form control validator.

Viewers / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-json-treeview (⭐6) - A collapsible JSON tree view for Angular.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Audio and Video Tools / File Sharing

*   [MacMusicPlayer (⭐45)](https://github.com/samzong/macmusicplayer) - A clean, lightweight music player for macOS users. ![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software") ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Audio and Video Tools / File Sharing

  • MacMusicPlayer (⭐45) - A clean, lightweight music player for macOS users.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Projects Using Vue.js / Apps/Websites

*   [MapperMate](https://mappermate.com) - Free-to-use tilemap editor used to create, edit, and manage tilemaps for 2D games
*   [Chris Courses](https://chriscourses.com) - JavaScript and 2D game dev learning platform with interactive videos, quizzes, and code challenges
items.content_html:
Projects Using Vue.js / Apps/Websites

  • MapperMate - Free-to-use tilemap editor used to create, edit, and manage tilemaps for 2D games
  • Chris Courses - JavaScript and 2D game dev learning platform with interactive videos, quizzes, and code challenges

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Bot Building

*   [telegram-bot-api (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/go-telegram-bot-api/telegram-bot-api) - Simple and clean Telegram bot client.
items.content_html:
Bot Building

  • telegram-bot-api (⭐6.2k) - Simple and clean Telegram bot client.

items.title: Awesome Integration
items.content_text:
### Projects / API Design

*   [Spectral (⭐2.7k) (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/stoplightio/spectral) - Detect and fix errors in your JSON/YAML files using this linter tool that supports OpenAPI 3.0 & 2.0 and AsyncAPI.

### Projects / API Documentation

*   [Stoplight Elements (⭐2k) (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/stoplightio/elements) - Provides modular, attractive UI components for building comprehensive API reference and tutorial documentation.

### Projects / API Gateway

*   [Apache APISIX (⭐15k) (⭐15k)](https://github.com/apache/apisix) - A high-performance, dynamic gateway featuring real-time traffic management and powerful plugin integrations.

### Projects / Integration Frameworks

*   [Apache Camel (⭐5.8k) (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/apache/camel) - Robust integration framework leveraging Enterprise Integration Patterns to seamlessly connect diverse systems and APIs.

### Resources / API Specification

*   [Standard Webhooks (⭐1.4k) (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/standard-webhooks/standard-webhooks) - Open source tools and guidelines for sending webhooks easily, securely, and reliably.
items.content_html:
Projects / API Design

  • Spectral (⭐2.7k) (⭐2.8k) - Detect and fix errors in your JSON/YAML files using this linter tool that supports OpenAPI 3.0 & 2.0 and AsyncAPI.

Projects / API Documentation

  • Stoplight Elements (⭐2k) (⭐2.1k) - Provides modular, attractive UI components for building comprehensive API reference and tutorial documentation.

Projects / API Gateway

  • Apache APISIX (⭐15k) (⭐15k) - A high-performance, dynamic gateway featuring real-time traffic management and powerful plugin integrations.

Projects / Integration Frameworks

  • Apache Camel (⭐5.8k) (⭐5.9k) - Robust integration framework leveraging Enterprise Integration Patterns to seamlessly connect diverse systems and APIs.

Resources / API Specification

  • Standard Webhooks (⭐1.4k) (⭐1.5k) - Open source tools and guidelines for sending webhooks easily, securely, and reliably.
